course.title: Exploration and Empire Building
course.meeting_text: M., W., F., at 10, and a weekly section to be arranged.
course.description: This course studies the relationships between scientific study, aesthetic representation, and imperial power. Students will examine documentary and visual records of encounters between indigenous peoples, agents of rival empires, and the physical environment along the vast Siberian and Pacific frontiers.
course.notes: This course fulfills the requirement that one of the eight General Education courses also engages substantially with the Study of the Past.
